ecology.description: The environment is a major determinant of health, estimated to account for almost 20% of all deaths in the WHO European Region.

genetics.description: Multivariate studies show that genetic factors enhancing SWB are partly overlapping with those protecting against depression and other mental health problems.

lifestyle.description: According to WHO, 60% of related factors to individual health and quality of life are correlated to lifestyle.

medicine.description: Relationship between health insurance (or lack of insurance), use of medical care and health outcomes for specific conditions and types of services, and with overall health status and mortality.
medicine.title: Medicine

patientAdmission.description: Admission of a patient means allowing and facilitating a patient to stay in the hospital unit or ward for observation, investigation, and treatment of the disease he or she is suffering from.
patientAdmission.title: Patient admission

patientDischarge.description: A hospital will discharge you when you no longer need to receive inpatient care and can go home. Or, a hospital will discharge you to send you to another type of facility.
patientDischarge.title: Patient's discharge

treatmentStarts.description: Part of the evaluation and treatment of any patient, regardless of condition or diagnosis, is an appropriate framework or pathway for diagnosis, treatment, and, if necessary, referral for specialty care.
treatmentStarts.title: Treatment starts
